section_program.heading: Program Scope
entries: Fil+ is designed for all client actors with quality data who engage in distributed onboarding.

Client actors can be either data owners or preparers (including SPs), who either provide some form of KYC (and KYB) information to earn social trust or prove long term commitment (i.e., collateral in a trustless notary)

Quality data is all content that meets local regulatory requirements and
  • the data owner wants to see on the network, including private/encrypted data
  • or is open and retrievable
  • or demonstrates proof of concept or utility of the network, such as efforts to improve onboarding
Distributed onboarding is generally defined as: multiple physical locations and multiple storage provider entities to serve client requirements

page_content.roadmap_subheading: Guiding program quality, transparency and enablement

events.text: Update quality dashboard with new graphs and metrics (CID Checker Bot/Deal distribution and Retrieval bot)
Trustless Notary Design and ideation
Retrieval bot (improved HTTP and Bitswap based retrieval testing)
Update client dashboard
Improvements for T&T WG for dispute resolution and proposed experiments

KYC integration (Togggle.io)
Launch DataCap removal tooling
filplus.storage tooling and design enhancements
Audit of Notary engagement and SLA participation
Development of new Fil+ backend to reduce friction in LDN process
Ship V2 of the compliance dashboard (previously quality dashboard)
Develop and deploy at least 3 metrics to measure compliance for DC usage
Trustless Notary pilot
Fil Dev Summit - Singapore (Governance and Community track)
Fil Dev Summit - Iceland (Governance and Community track)
FIL Istanbul (Fil+ Day)
Ship POC tooling for client risk/reputation

Open sourcing and documenting Fil+ tooling & Datacapstats dashboards
New Notary Election Cycle proposals to community, including new terminology & types
Expanding overall program and introducing allocators
Launch Aggregation and Compliance (AC) bot to enforce Fil+ client standards
Launch DataCap removal bot
Update Fil+ registry app with new interface
Migrate LDN applications towards JSON files
Launch new Fil+ backend to reduce friction in LDN process
